short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translates a page based on Lord Birthday's cool and laidback conversational tricks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you after a quick and easy way to make your web surfing experience more cool and laid back?

LOOK nuns on ripple FURTHER!

Inspired by Lord Birthday's '9 Conversational Tricks to make people think you are cool and laid back', this extension translates your page to become a lil bit cooler.

This extension takes the text the webpage in your current tab and replaces them according to the comic:

ok/okay -> oak nuggins
yes -> yank train
no -> nuns on ripple
I think -> I put a boogie dollar down
golf -> slapping the dimpled balls
I feel sick -> Mama's got the nasty jam
good idea -> gold hat, cool cat
this job is killing me -> this gig gonna slash me hips
let's grab lunch on monday -> dip me in ya monday milk
let's go -> limp cone
difficult -> grubby grunt house
 

Appreciate the masterpiece here: https://www.facebook.com/lordbirthday/photos/a.1625689654351050/1818152765104737/?type=1&theater
